domain_description: "You will be asked to predict the political party which will obtain majority at 20 different states in the 2016 US presidential elections."

task 01.description: predict which party will win mayority in the state of Kentucky for the 2016 presidential elections.

task 02.description: predict which party will win mayority in the state of Georgia for the 2016 presidential elections.
